text: Hans Hartleb (born 6 November 1951) is a German skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1972 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:German male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of East Germany Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1972 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Thuringia
title: Hans Hartleb
